head.title: The Way We Live Now: 7-2-00: Gallery; Flag Amendment

hedline.hl1: The Way We Live Now: 7-2-00: Gallery; Flag Amendment

abstract.p: Images from Stripes and Stars: The Graphic History of an American Icon, new exhibit at American Institute of Graphic Arts National Design Center in New York; photos (S)

block.p: These images are taken from ''Stripes and Stars: The Graphic History of an American Icon,'' a new exhibition at the American Institute of Graphic Arts National Design Center in New York. The assorted flags, objects and works of art in the exhibit, which closes Aug. 25, come from the collection of Kit Hinrichs.
